documentation.text:
@dev Constructor sets initial owner and opens registration
 @param initialController Initial election controller address
@dev Modifier to restrict access to owner or authorized controller

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "VoterRegistry: controller cannot be zero address"

arguments.value: VoterRegistry: controller cannot be zero address

documentation.text:
@dev Set the election controller address
 @param _controller Address of the election controller

@dev Mark a voter as having voted
 @param voterHash Keccak256 hash of voter identity

@dev Set registration status
 @param isOpen True to open registration, false to close

devdoc.details: Manages voter registration and eligibility for elections Stores voter records with hashed identities for privacy

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

constructor.details: Constructor sets initial owner and opens registration

returns.voted: Number of voters who have voted

isEligible(bytes32).details: Check if a voter is eligible to vote

returns._0: bool True if voter is registered and has not voted

markVoted(bytes32).details: Mark a voter as having voted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerVoter(bytes32,uint256).details: Register a new voter with hashed identity

params.constituencyId: Constituency ID the voter belongs to

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.isOpen: True to open registration, false to close

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: VoterRegistry
